content:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Nasdaq cracks down on crypto treasury names, citing “unfair advantage.”
• Coinbase, MicroStrategy, and others feel the heat, stocks plummeting.
• Regulatory uncertainty grips the market, investors spooked as hell.

Impact — Nasdaq’s move could fuck up the whole crypto integration vibe if it keeps scaring off mainstream players.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2025/09/04/crypto-treasury-names-hammered-further-as-nasdaq-reportedly-ups-scrutiny
